mapper.delete: delete from favorites where mid = #{mid} and sid = #{sid}
mapper.insert: insert into favorites(fid, sid, mid, fcheck) VALUES('F_'||LTRIM(TO_CHAR(SEQU_FAVORITES_FID.NEXTVAL,'0000')), #{sid}, #{mid}, 'Y')
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET RSTATUS = 'COMPLETED' WHERE to_date(rdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') < to_date(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND RSTATUS = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.select: select count(*) from reservation where mid = #{mid} and rstatus = 'COMPLETED' AND DELETEYN = 'N'

select RNO,MID,SID,RID, MEMBERID, MNAME, TEL, MPHONE,SNAME,SLOCSHORT, RDATE, RTIME, GUESTNUMBER, RPHONE, RSTATUS, REVIEWYN, SMPHOTO, DELETEYN from (select RNO,MID,SID,RID, MEMBERID, MNAME, TEL, MPHONE,SNAME,SLOCSHORT, RDATE, RTIME, GUESTNUMBER, RPHONE, RSTATUS, REVIEWYN, SMPHOTO, DELETEYN from (select ROWNUM RNO, M.MID MID,S.SID SID,R.RID RID, M.MEMBERID MEMBERID, M.MNAME MNAME, M.TEL TEL, M.MPHONE MPHONE, S.SNAME SNAME, S.SLOCSHORT SLOCSHORT, to_char(R.RDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') RDATE, R.RTIME RTIME, R.GUESTNUMBER GUESTNUMBER, R.RPHONE RPHONE, R.RSTATUS RSTATUS, R.REVIEWYN, S.SMPHOTO SMPHOTO, R.DELETEYN DELETEYN from MEMBER M, SHOP S, RESERVATION R WHERE R.MID = M.MID AND R.SID = S.SID and M.MID = #{mid} and RSTATUS = 'COMPLETED' AND R.DELETEYN = 'N' order by rdate desc, RTIME)) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{startCount} AND #{endCount}

select SID, RID, MID, RDATE, RTIME, GUESTNUMBER, MNAME, SNAME, SLOC, SLOCSHORT, SINTRO, SPHONE, SOPENINGHOUR, SCLOSINGHOUR, SCLOSINGDATE, SDEPOSIT, MPHONE, SMPHOTO from(select S.SID SID, R.RID RID, M.MID MID, to_char(R.RDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') RDATE, R.RTIME RTIME, R.GUESTNUMBER GUESTNUMBER, M.MNAME MNAME, S.SNAME SNAME, S.SLOC SLOC, S.SLOCSHORT SLOCSHORT, S.SINTRO SINTRO, S.SPHONE SPHONE, S.SOPENINGHOUR SOPENINGHOUR, S.SCLOSINGHOUR SCLOSINGHOUR, S.SCLOSINGDATE SCLOSINGDATE, S.SDEPOSIT SDEPOSIT, M.MPHONE MPHONE, S.SMPHOTO SMPHOTO from SHOP S, RESERVATION R, MEMBER M WHERE R.SID = S.SID AND R.MID = M.MID) where MID = #{mid} AND SID = #{sid} AND RID = #{rid}

select MID,SID,RID, MEMBERID , MNAME, TEL, MPHONE,SNAME,SLOCSHORT, RDATE, RTIME, GUESTNUMBER, RPHONE, RSTATUS, SMPHOTO, DELETEYN from(select M.MID MID,S.SID SID,R.RID RID, M.MEMBERID MEMBERID, M.MNAME MNAME, M.TEL TEL, M.MPHONE MPHONE, S.SNAME SNAME, S.SLOCSHORT SLOCSHORT, to_char(R.RDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') RDATE, R.RTIME RTIME, R.GUESTNUMBER GUESTNUMBER, R.RPHONE RPHONE, R.RSTATUS RSTATUS, S.SMPHOTO SMPHOTO, R.DELETEYN DELETEYN from MEMBER M, SHOP S, RESERVATION R WHERE R.MID = M.MID AND R.SID = S.SID ORDER BY RDATE DESC, RTIME desc) WHERE MID = #{mid} AND RSTATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND DELETEYN = 'N'
